mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id , m.menu_name, m.url, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.visible, m.create_time from bt_menu m left join bt_user_menu um on m.menu_id = um.menu_id where um.user_id = #{userId} and m.visible = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.order_num,m.menu_id

select distinct m.menu_id , m.parent_id , m.menu_name , m.url, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.visible, m.create_time from bt_menu m left join bt_user_menu um on m.menu_id = um.menu_id left join bt_menu m2 ON m.parent_id = m2.menu_id where um.user_id = #{userId} and m.visible = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 AND (m.parent_id = 0 OR (m2.visible = 0 AND m2.del_flag = 0))

select distinct m.menu_id , m.parent_id , m.menu_name , m.url, m.perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.visible, m.create_time from bt_menu m where m.visible = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 and m.menu_id in ( #{item})
